column.name: Number_of_lines
column.description: Number of lines in the file.

column.name: Master_log_name
column.description: The name of the master binary log currently being read from the master.

column.name: Master_log_pos
column.description: The master log position of the last read event.

column.name: Host
column.description: The host name of the master.

column.name: User_name
column.description: The user name used to connect to the master.

column.name: User_password
column.description: The password used to connect to the master.

column.name: Port
column.description: The network port used to connect to the master.

column.name: Connect_retry
column.description: The period (in seconds) that the slave will wait before trying to reconnect to the master.

column.name: Enabled_ssl
column.description: Indicates whether the server supports SSL connections.

column.name: Ssl_ca
column.description: The file used for the Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.

column.name: Ssl_capath
column.description: The path to the Certificate Authority (CA) certificates.

column.name: Ssl_cert
column.description: The name of the SSL certificate file.

column.name: Ssl_cipher
column.description: The name of the cipher in use for the SSL connection.

column.name: Ssl_key
column.description: The name of the SSL key file.

column.name: Ssl_verify_server_cert
column.description: Whether to verify the server certificate.

column.name: Bind
column.description: Displays which interface is employed when connecting to the MySQL server

column.name: Ignored_server_ids
column.description: The number of server IDs to be ignored, followed by the actual server IDs

column.name: Uuid
column.description: The master server uuid.

column.name: Retry_count
column.description: Number of reconnect attempts, to the master, before giving up.

column.name: Ssl_crl
column.description: The file used for the Certificate Revocation List (CRL)

column.name: Ssl_crlpath
column.description: The path used for Certificate Revocation List (CRL) files

column.name: Enabled_auto_position
column.description: Indicates whether GTIDs will be used to retrieve events from the master.

column.name: Channel_name
column.description: The channel on which the slave is connected to a source. Used in Multisource Replication

column.name: Tls_version
column.description: Tls version
